email.title: Freshers' (and not so) Swag Bag Collection
email.text:
Hi all,
We are very excited to announce that after 2 years of no DoCSoc(ks), we can once again distribute our **Freshers' Swag Bags**!
Pop by rooms **217/218** in Huxley on **Thursday** the 17th between **9 am and 12 pm** to grab yours!
